titles: The churches securitie, togither with the antidote or preseruative of euer waking faith A treatise conteyning many fruitefull instructions, moralities and consolations fit for the time and age wherein wee liue. Herevnto is annexed a sound and profitable treatise of the generall signes and fore-runners of the last iudgement. By Thomas Drax.
author: Draxe, Thomas, d. 1618.
publisher: Imprinted by George Eld, and are to be sold by Iohn Wright at his shoppe at Christ-church Gate,
notes: "The generall signes and forerunners of Christs comming to iudgement" has separate divisional title.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
